title: os: TestRemoveAllRace fails on nacl or arm or both
body:
nacl-arm-cheney failed with:

http://build.golang.org/log/9a256862a952f319306f2c7138bea3b6cd313a5f

--- FAIL: TestRemoveAllRace (0.02s)

FAIL
FAIL	os	2.837s
